   <div class="pancake use-image-placeholders solo wipeout channel-ece_frontpage" data-group="wipeout" data-group-index="0">
    <div class="teaser teaser-highlight teaser-prominent teaser-hero">
     <figure class="section-theme-border" data-mod="image">
      <a aria-label="Police raid finds hundreds of cannabis plants - but clues lead to bigger bust next door" data-link-tracking="" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/news/coventry-news/coventry-police-drugs-home-properties-20225901">
       <img alt="" data-src="https://i2-prod.chroniclelive.co.uk/incoming/article20225929.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_More-than-300-cannabis-plants-were-found-across-the-two-properties.jpg" data-srcset="https://i2-prod.chroniclelive.co.uk/incoming/article20225929.ece/ALTERNATES/s508/0_More-than-300-cannabis-plants-were-found-across-the-two-properties.jpg 508w, https://i2-prod.chroniclelive.co.uk/incoming/article20225929.ece/ALTERNATES/s810/0_More-than-300-cannabis-plants-were-found-across-the-two-properties.jpg 810w" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent.png"/>
      </a>
     </figure>
     <figure class="desktop section-theme-border" data-mod="image">
      <a href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/news/coventry-news/coventry-police-drugs-home-properties-20225901">

     </a>
     <a class="description" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/news/coventry-news/coventry-police-drugs-home-properties-20225901">

     </a>

      Why lockdown law in England will be extended until October
     </a>
     <div>
      <a class="label" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|featuredStories|Tag|Fire|index 1" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/news/uk-world-news/">
       UK &amp; World News
      </a>
      <a class="description" data-link-tracking="undefineddescriptionundefined" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/news/uk-world-news/lockdown-law-england-extended-until-20226964">
       "We have said we will take steps cautiously and we will be driven by the data rather than those dates."
      </a>
     </div>

      </a>

     <div class="featured-image mod-backgroundImage" data-backgroundimage="https://i2-prod.walesonline.co.uk/incoming/article20210535.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_840f8998-daf0-41d6-9006-8e33fa6244c5.jpg" data-mod="backgroundImage">

     <figure class="section-theme-border" data-mod="image">
      <a aria-label="Peloton issues urgent warning to parents after death of child" data-link-tracking="" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/news/uk-world-news/peloton-issues-urgent-warning-parents-20210536">

      </a>
     </figure>
     <a class="label section-theme-highlight" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|News|MostRecent|Tag|Fire|index 1" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/news/uk-world-news/">
      UK &amp; World News
     </a>
     <a class="headline publication-font" data-link-tracking="" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/news/uk-world-news/peloton-issues-urgent-warning-parents-20210536">
      Peloton issues urgent warning to parents after death of child
     </a>
     <a class="description" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/news/uk-world-news/peloton-issues-urgent-warning-parents-20210536">
      In another incident, a three-year-old child was trapped and suffered head and brain injuries
     </a>
    </div>

    <div class="teaser teaser-highlight">
     <figure class="section-theme-border" data-mod="image">
      <a aria-label="Huge change to how you get on Love Island thanks to Tinder" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|sectionGroup3|image|index 1" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/whats-on/whats-on-news/huge-change-how-you-love-20226887">

     </figure>
     <a class="label section-theme-highlight" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|News|MostRecent|Tag|Fire|index 1" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/whats-on/whats-on-news/">
      What's On News
     </a>
     <a class="headline publication-font" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|sectionGroup3|title|index 1" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/whats-on/whats-on-news/huge-change-how-you-love-20226887">

     </a>
     <a class="description" data-link-tracking="undefineddescriptionundefined" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/whats-on/whats-on-news/huge-change-how-you-love-20226887">
      Swipe Right and you could get a priority casting call
     </a>
    </div>
    <div class="pancake duet secondary">
     <div class="teaser">

           <a aria-label="Three new Covid symptoms found by researchers" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|mostRecent|image|index 1" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/news/coventry-news/three-new-covid-symptoms-found-20226795">

           </div>

          <a class="label section-theme-highlight" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|News|MostRecent|Tag|Fire|index 1" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/all-about/coronavirus">
           Coronavirus
          </a>
          <a class="headline publication-font" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|mostRecent|title|index 1" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/news/coventry-news/three-new-covid-symptoms-found-20226795">
           Three new Covid symptoms found by researchers
          </a>
          <a class="description" data-link-tracking="undefineddescriptionundefined" href="https://www.coventrytelegraph.net/news/coventry-news/three-new-covid-symptoms-found-20226795">
           Hearing problems may now be strongly associated with the virus, research has suggested
          </a>
         </div>

  <script>
   var publicSectionParams = window.TMCONFIG.publicSectionParams;
var environment = 'digitalData.page.attributes.environment'.split('.').reduce(function(acc,cur) { return acc && acc[cur] || undefined; }, window);
if (environment === 'prod' && publicSectionParams['hotjar.hjid']) {
(function(h,o,t,j,a,r){
h.hj=h.hj||function()
{(h.hj.q=h.hj.q||[]).push(arguments)}
;
h._hjSettings={hjid:publicSectionParams['hotjar.hjid'],hjsv:6};
a=o.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
r=o.createElement('script');r.async=1;
r.src=t+h._hjSettings.hjid+j+h._hjSettings.hjsv;
a.appendChild(r);

  </script>
  <script>
   window.console.log("iPhone/Edge Fix running...");
(function (doc) {
var agnt = navigator.userAgent;
var css = ".captify-widget>div>div>div{padding-bottom:30px!important}";
var count = 300; // 300 * 100ms == 30000ms limit
function isIphone() {
return /iPhone/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdge() {
return /Edge/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdgeOrIphone() {
return isIphone() || isEdge();
}
function applyFix() {
var ifr = doc.querySelector(".captify-iframe");
if (ifr && isEdge(agnt)) {
fixEdge(ifr);
} else if (ifr && ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.head && isIphone(agnt)) {
fixIphone(ifr.contentDocument);
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(applyFix, 100);
}
}
}
function fixIphone(doc) {
var styleTag = doc.createElement("style");
styleTag.type = "text/css";
styleTag.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(css));
styleTag.cssText = doc.head.appendChild(styleTag);
}
function fixEdge(ifr) {
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
//finished
} else {
ifr.classList.add("hidden");
count = 100; // 100 * 50ms == 5000ms limit
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
function unhideEdge(ifr){
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
ifr.classList.remove("hidden");
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
}
if (isEdgeOrIphone()) {
applyFix();
}
})(document);
  </script>
  <div class="lazy-resources" data-css="[]" data-immediate="" data-js="[]" data-mod="lazyResources">

   window.addEventListener('load', function() {
setTimeout(function() {
["https://s2-prod.coventrytelegraph.net/@trinitymirrordigital/breaking-news-client/9d20c175683d1d3c65f770ed2a2f4e9d4bdc4224/pull.js"].forEach(file => {const el=document.createElement('SCRIPT');el.setAttribute('src', file);el.setAttribute('type', 'module');document.body.appendChild(el);});
}, 3000);
});
  </script>
